divs: sighting detailsafter settling down i can tell your more about what we saw. first of all is the size of the moon tonight,but a perfect round circle. it was giving off the same color as the moon, burning. it was completely turquoise \ green, and leaving a trailer at least tree times as long as the object itself. we was facing due south. if it hit the ground, it didnt make any noise. plus something the size of the moon hitting the earth would kill all of us. like i said earlier it was just like the one they was broadcasting on the new show in california. the only difference , this one was not on a plane... it was heading straight down towards the ground. next we noticed at least 3 planes circuling the area. look like they was trying to find the area where the object went\hit. once again. it was the size of the moon in the sky falling to earth.
